sqls.sql:
select * from storage_zone t where 1=1 and t.record_flag_s ='A' <#if agenc_no_s??> and AGENC_NO_S=:agenc_no_s </#if> <#if changed_by_s??> and CHANGED_BY_S=:changed_by_s </#if> <#if changed_time_t??> and CHANGED_TIME_T=:changed_time_t </#if> <#if created_by_s??> and CREATED_BY_S=:created_by_s </#if> <#if created_time_t??> and CREATED_TIME_T=:created_time_t </#if> <#if full_loaded_number_i??> and FULL_LOADED_NUMBER_I=:full_loaded_number_i </#if> <#if record_flag_s??> and RECORD_FLAG_S=:record_flag_s </#if> <#if rfidcode_s??> and RFIDCODE_S=:rfidcode_s </#if> <#if space1_s??> and SPACE1_S=:space1_s </#if> <#if space2_s??> and SPACE2_S=:space2_s </#if> <#if space3_s??> and SPACE3_S=:space3_s </#if> <#if space4_s??> and SPACE4_S=:space4_s </#if> <#if space5_s??> and SPACE5_S=:space5_s </#if> <#if s_factory_s??> and S_FACTORY_S=:s_factory_s </#if> <#if tire_shelf_code_s??> and TIRE_SHELF_CODE_S like :tire_shelf_code_s </#if> <#if tire_shelf_description_s??> and TIRE_SHELF_DESCRIPTION_S=:tire_shelf_description_s </#if> <#if tire_shelf_name_s??> and TIRE_SHELF_NAME_S=:tire_shelf_name_s </#if>
<#if start_time??&&end_time??> and CREATED_TIME_T between TO_DATE(:start_time,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') and TO_DATE(:end_time,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') </#if> <#if materialgroup_s??> and MATERIALGROUP_S=:materialgroup_s </#if> <#if category??> and CATEGORY=:category </#if> <#if sort??&&order??> order by ${sort} ${order} <#else> order by atr_key desc </#if>

select count(1) from storage_zone t where 1=1 and t.record_flag_s ='A' <#if agenc_no_s??> and AGENC_NO_S=:agenc_no_s </#if> <#if changed_by_s??> and CHANGED_BY_S=:changed_by_s </#if> <#if changed_time_t??> and CHANGED_TIME_T=:changed_time_t </#if> <#if created_by_s??> and CREATED_BY_S=:created_by_s </#if> <#if created_time_t??> and CREATED_TIME_T=:created_time_t </#if> <#if full_loaded_number_i??> and FULL_LOADED_NUMBER_I=:full_loaded_number_i </#if> <#if record_flag_s??> and RECORD_FLAG_S=:record_flag_s </#if> <#if rfidcode_s??> and RFIDCODE_S=:rfidcode_s </#if> <#if space1_s??> and SPACE1_S=:space1_s </#if> <#if space2_s??> and SPACE2_S=:space2_s </#if> <#if space3_s??> and SPACE3_S=:space3_s </#if> <#if space4_s??> and SPACE4_S=:space4_s </#if> <#if space5_s??> and SPACE5_S=:space5_s </#if> <#if s_factory_s??> and S_FACTORY_S=:s_factory_s </#if> <#if tire_shelf_code_s??> and TIRE_SHELF_CODE_S like :tire_shelf_code_s </#if> <#if tire_shelf_description_s??> and TIRE_SHELF_DESCRIPTION_S=:tire_shelf_description_s </#if> <#if tire_shelf_name_s??> and TIRE_SHELF_NAME_S=:tire_shelf_name_s </#if> <#if materialgroup_s??> and MATERIALGROUP_S=:materialgroup_s </#if>
<#if category??> and CATEGORY=:category </#if>
<#if start_time??&&end_time??> and CREATED_TIME_T between TO_DATE(:start_time,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') and TO_DATE(:end_time,'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') </#if>

select t.storage_zone_key, t.category, t.description, t.storage_zone_name, u.materialgroup_s, u.is_allow_child_stock_s, u.remarks_s,
C1.USERNAME operater_s, u.s_factory_s, to_char(u.operatetime_t, 'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS')operatetime_t, u.storage_zone_barcode_s, u.storage_type_s, u.inventory_barcode_s, u.storage_specifications_s, u.parent_stock_s, u.inventory_name_en_s, u.parent_flag_s from storage_zone t, uda_storagezone u, area_storage_zone m, area a,CORE_USER C1 where t.storage_zone_key = u.object_key(+) and t.storage_zone_key = m.child_key and a.area_key = m.parent_key and :area_name=:area_name and u.operater_s = C1.USERCODE(+) order by t.storage_zone_name asc

sql.comment: 获取库区下的库位代码

sqls.sql: select d.child_key from storage_zone t,storagezone_storageunit d where t.storage_zone_key= d.parent_key and t.storage_zone_key=:storage_zone_key

select t.storage_zone_key, t.category, t.description, t.storage_zone_name, u.materialgroup_s, u.is_allow_child_stock_s, u.remarks_s, us1.username operater_s, u.s_factory_s, to_char(u.operatetime_t, 'YYYY-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS')operatetime_t, u.storage_zone_barcode_s, u.storage_type_s, u.inventory_barcode_s, u.storage_specifications_s, u.parent_stock_s, u.inventory_name_en_s, u.parent_flag_s from storage_zone t, uda_storagezone u, area_storage_zone m, area a , CORE_USER US1 where t.storage_zone_key = u.object_key(+) and t.storage_zone_key = m.child_key and a.area_key = m.parent_key and a.area_name=:area_name and u.operater_s = US1.USERCODE <#if description??> and t.description like '%'||:description||'%' </#if> <#if category??> and t.storage_zone_name like '%'||:category||'%' </#if> order by t.storage_zone_name

sql.comment: 返回半部件用库区名称

sqls.sql: select t.storage_zone_name,t.description from storage_zone t, uda_storagezone u,area_storage_zone az,area a where t.storage_zone_key = u.object_key(+) and t.storage_zone_key=az.child_key and a.area_key=az.parent_key and a.area_name=:area_name order by t.storage_zone_name asc

sql.comment: 选择物料组时根据当前机台条码校验当前机台对应的物料组是否已存在

sqls.sql: select d.materialgroup_s from Storage_Zone c, uda_storagezone d where c.storage_zone_key = d.object_key and c.category =:zoneName and d.materialgroup_s=:materialGroup

sql.comment: 删除库区时校验该产线及物料组相关的当前日期及以后的日计划是否存在

sqls.sql: select t.planno_s from AT_A_PM_ProductPlan t where t.record_flag_s = 'A' and t.equip_code_s =:zoneCode and t.materialgroup_s=:materialGroupCode and t.plandate_s > =to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') order by t.planno_s asc

sql.comment: 校验库区名称的唯一性

sqls.sql: select t.storage_zone_name from storage_zone t where t.storage_zone_name=:zoneName
